name: Core Hunter 3
body:
Looking for the old Core Hunter 2 website? It's [here](v2/).

## Getting started with Core Hunter
Core Hunter is implemented in Java and can be executed from R or using the graphical interface. In both cases you will need to have installed a [Java Runtime Environment (JRE)](http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jre8-downloads-2133155.html) version 8 or later.

#### R Package
The R package `corehunter` is available on CRAN and can be installed with
```
> install.packages("corehunter")
```

#### Graphical interface
The graphical interface of Core Hunter is under development. More information will be posted here soon.
